body: This spell creates the visual illusion of an object, creature, or force, as visualized by you. The illusion does not create sound, smell, texture, or temperature. You can move the image within the limits of the size of the effect.
description: Creates minor illusion of your design.
level_text: Arcanist: 1; Bard: 1; Magus: 1; Skald: 1; Sorcerer: 1; Wizard: 1

effects.text: visual figment that cannot extend beyond four 10-ft. cubes + one 10-ft. cube/level (S)
effects.name: Effect

component_text: V, S, F (a bit of fleece)
name: Silent Image
